title: AI Slop is the new spam!
content:
Slop is the new Spam. Slop is unwanted AI-generated content

Elon Musk’s GrokAI raised $6 billion in Series B funding at $18 billion in valuation. Who else doesn’t think the Gartner Hype cycle is at its peak!

It should come as no surprise to anyone that Facebook (nee Meta) is using dark patterns to hoodwink its users into agreeing to train its AI models on their data. Just as it did with privacy. A leopard can’t change its spots. And Meta can’t stop being Facebook. Twitter Thread @Tantacrul

“it’s inevitable. I mean, it’s like saying, ‘I don’t believe these cars are gunna work. Let’s just stick with the horses. Let’s stick with the horses.’” George Lucas on Generative AI in creative fields.
author: Om Malik
